Name: fibular hypoplasia and complex brachydactyly
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that is characterised by severe reduction or absence of the fibula and complex brachydactyly.

Name: bone benign neoplasm
Definition: A connective tissue benign neoplasm that is located_in bone.

Name: bone remodeling disease
Definition: A bone disease that results_in formation or resorption abnormalities located_in bone.

Name: bone development disease
Definition: A bone disease that results_in abnormal growth and development located_in bone or located_in cartilage.

Name: ischemic bone disease
Definition: A bone disease that results_in an interruption of blood supply located_in bone.

Name: bone structure disease
Definition: A bone disease that has_material_basis_in an abnormality in the location or function of the skeletal structure.

Name: Crouzon syndrome-acanthosis nigricans syndrome
Definition: An autosomal dominant disease characterized by Crouzon-like features

Name: skeletal tuberculosis
Definition: An extrapulmonary tuberculosis that results in formation of lesions located in bone.

Name: obsolete cystic
Definition: An extrapulmonary tuberculosis that results in formation of lesions located in bone.

Name: bone inflammation disease
Definition: A bone disease that results_in inflammation of the located_in bone.

Name: arthropathy
Definition: A bone disease that is located_in the joint.
Synonym: Joint ankylosis of the upper arm

Name: obsolete chondrogenic neoplasm
Definition: A bone disease that is located_in the joint.

Name: obsolete mediastinum chondroma
Definition: A bone disease that is located_in the joint.
